mapper.select:
select ao.* from amazon_order ao
and merchant_id concat('%',#{merchantId},'%') and marketplace_id concat('%',#{marketplaceId},'%') and amazon_order_id concat('%',#{amazonOrderId},'%') and seller_order_id concat('%',#{sellerOrderId},'%') and purchase_date >= date(#{purchaseDateStart})
and purchase_date < DATE_ADD(date(#{purchaseDateEnd}),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
and order_status=#{orderStatus}
and buyer_email concat('%',#{buyerEmail},'%')
and exists (select 1 from amazon_order_item aoi where aoi.amazon_order_id=ao.amazon_order_id and aoi.seller_sku like concat('%',#{sellerSku},'%'))
order by ao.update_time desc
